comments.author: tamasvajk
comments.body: @PaulHigin I don't mind reverting the second commit, but I'm unsure who makes the final decision in this, and I'd like to avoid going back and forth between the two variants. Is it @iSazonov who decides in the end?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @tamasvajk I like first commit more too as more readable in the assert context.

comments.author: tamasvajk
comments.body: @iSazonov thank you for the confirmation. I reverted the second commit.
